reviews.text: 2star is not for the branch but pathethic internet bank services. Uco bank asked me to open nre account services with them, but the internet banking for an nre doesn't work at all on weekends.üòì ‚Ä¶

Worst Experience ever had.
Their passbook printing machine isn't working for more than last 3 months. And when asked for the options they moved me to a table where a man took the passbook for printing and then I waited for 15 minutes standing infront of him. He was busy in his own work and ignored the passbook completely and when I reminded him He told me to wait more. One by one all people behind me in the queue went back. The man had a very bad attitude. He didn't care about the customer's time value. Then I have to visit another branch just for printing the passbook.
Other people here are very supportive and friendly.‚úåÔ∏è

Something 1 month ,  4-5 time's reach bank for some correction my passbook but no help all time connectivity issues..... & other issue
worst experience , staff member have a problem giving me a pen and then giving it to me by taunting
I have to see this area cool and calm this branch having friendly staff with Atm situated in the branch
